title: Font that has 'E' that looks like a '3'
content:
A few months back I found a serif font on one of the large font sites in which the uppercase 'E' looked like a '3', but facing in the same direction as an E does. Now I can't find it.

Does anyone know what font I'm talking about? Or any like it?

Appreciate the help. Thanks.
author: Snaxdzl

comments.content: Wow...you've done it. Thanks so much! I bow to your speedy and thorough font knowledge.

You are welcome.  
The only reason I knew it is because I have that page bookmarked so I can buy it someday.
